fields_of_interest: Education and training, Energy, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: We contribute to the planning of the Work Programmes in the FCH JU, and follow developments in H2020
organisation_name: PLANET Planungsgruppe Energie und Technik GbR (PLANET)
membership:
KOBE (Oldenburg) 
OLEC - Oldenburger Energiecluster 
DWV - Deutscher Wasserstoff-Verband
goals__remit:
PLANET is an engineering and consultancy company based in Germany and working in the areas of 
- energy efficiency 
- renewable energies 
- energy storage 
- fuel cells and fuel cell applications & employment 
- hydrogen production and hydrogen applications & employment 
- life cycle analysis 
- environmental impact analysis
